KeywordCipher - Class in dkupert.cipher
Uses the parent class MonoAlphabeticCipher to encrypt and decrypt text using the KeywordCipher
KeywordCipher(String) - Constructor for class dkupert.cipher.KeywordCipher
The constructor sets the keyword
KeywordCipherException - Exception in dkupert.cipher.Exceptions
This class contains a custom exception which is used in Keywordcipher

The default constructor for the new exception
KeywordCipherException(String) - Constructor for exception dkupert.cipher.Exceptions.KeywordCipherException

KeywordCipherNotSuitableException - Exception in dkupert.cipher.Exceptions
This class contains a custom exception which is used in Keywordcipher
